description:
Application for a non-material amendment following grant of planning permission ref: P2018/3231/FUL for 'Refurbishment and recladding of existing office building with remodelling on the ground and 6th to 8th floors on the front elevation, a part 9 storey rear extension from lower ground to 7th floor, and an 8th floor of office accommodation instead of plant (with existing plant equipment consolidated and relocated to lower ground level), rear roof terraces and associated alterations, and a change of use of part of ground floor from existing office (Use Class B1(a)) to retail (Use Class A1), together with the introduction of cycle parking and other works' approved on 14/01/2020 to allow for the following alterations: 

(a) correct the revision number on previously approved plans drawings of the internal layout of 6th and 7th floors
decision_conditions: The non-materail amendment agreed is read in conjunction with the original planning application P2018/3231/FUL granted 14/01/2020.
site_name: Land And Access To Rear Adjacent To 14
